name: Us and Them (itch)
description:
In the aftermath of war, 1950s Korean journalist Jinsol Jeon struggles to find reason to live after the murder of her mentor. As a result, our protagonist’s two conflicting desires reflect on their host’s memories.

Created by Marie Yamamoto, Sean Yang, Alexander Qin, and Ryan Burgert as part of and won 1st place in the Stony Brook RenPy Competition 2023.
